Body:
I'm new to WSO2. I folllowed all steps from the wso website to install WSO2 IOT. After I attempt login to devicemgt I get the following errorError 500

I'm using Centos 7.2 with java and maven installed.

These are the logs:

Body: As of now, WSO2 IoT 3.1.0 has been released
column9: and it has fixed all of those issues. The reason for the issue is that default pack runs on the localhost URL. And SSL certificates are configured with the localhost. Therefore if you need to run the WSO2 IoT 3.1.0 on IP
column10:
you will have to change the configurations in few places.

But with the WSO2 IoT 3.1.0
column11: we have included a "change-ip.sh" script in [WSO2IoT-3.1.0]/scripts/ folder. If you run this script
column12:
you will be able to configure the product to IP based URLs.

"

Body:
These errors are still showing up in 3.3.0

You need to update the install instructions and/or provide a proper installation script. Currently WSO2IOT is not ready for production.
